name: Meditating
text: We will walk you through how to meditate properly, the benefits of regular meditation practice, and the various styles of meditation.

name: Studying for an Exam
text: If you have kept a good daily and weekly schedule, 15-20 hours should be about right for a mid-term, 20-30 for a final exam. Major papers take substantially more time and effort.

name: Completing an Assignment

name: Reading a Textbook
text: It can reduce stress, improve your mental health, and help you live longer. Reading also allows you to learn new things to help you succeed in your work and relationships.

name: Writing an Article
text: Circling back to your main point is the most straightforward way to wrap up your article. Simply reiterate your main point with slightly different verbiage.
